verses.arabicText: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ
verses.translation: In the name of Allah, the Entirely Merciful, the Especially Merciful.

verses.arabicText: الْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ رَبِّ الْعَالَمِينَ
verses.translation: [All] praise is [due] to Allah, Lord of the worlds -

verses.arabicText: الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ
verses.translation: The Entirely Merciful, the Especially Merciful,

verses.arabicText: مَالِكِ يَوْمِ الدِّينِ
verses.translation: Sovereign of the Day of Recompense.

verses.arabicText: إِيَّاكَ نَعْبُدُ وَإِيَّاكَ نَسْتَعِينُ
verses.translation: It is You we worship and You we ask for help.

verses.arabicText: اهْدِنَا الصِّرَاطَ الْمُسْتَقِيمَ
verses.translation: Guide us to the straight path -

verses.arabicText: صِرَاطَ الَّذِينَ أَنْعَمْتَ عَلَيْهِمْ غَيْرِ الْمَغْضُوبِ عَلَيْهِمْ وَلَا الضَّالِّينَ
verses.translation: The path of those upon whom You have bestowed favor, not of those who have evoked [Your] anger or of those who are astray.

verses.arabicText: الم
verses.translation: Alif, Lam, Meem.

verses.arabicText: ذَٰلِكَ الْكِتَابُ لَا رَيْبَ ۛ فِيهِ ۛ هُدًى لِّلْمُتَّقِينَ
verses.translation: This is the Book; in it is guidance sure, without doubt, to those who fear Allah.

verses.arabicText: الَّذِينَ يُؤْمِنُونَ بِالْغَيْبِ وَيُقِيمُونَ الصَّلَاةَ وَمِمَّا رَزَقْنَاهُمْ يُنفِقُونَ
verses.translation: Who believe in the Unseen, are steadfast in prayer, and spend out of what We have provided for them.

verses.arabicText: وَالَّذِينَ يُؤْمِنُونَ بِمَا أُنزِلَ إِلَيْكَ وَمَا أُنزِلَ مِن قَبْلِكَ وَبِالْآخِرَةِ هُمْ يُوقِنُونَ
verses.translation: And who believe in the Revelation sent to thee, and sent before thy time, and have the assurance of the Hereafter.

verses.arabicText: أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ عَلَىٰ هُدًى مِّن رَّبِّهِمْ ۖ وَأُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلْمُفْلِحُونَ
verses.translation: They are on true guidance, from their Lord, and it is these who will prosper.

verses.arabicText: إِنَّ الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا سَوَآءٌ عَلَيْهِمْ أَأَنذَرْتَهُمْ أَمْ لَمْ تُنذِرْهُمْ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ
verses.translation: As to those who reject Faith, it is the same to them whether thou warn them or do not warn them; they will not believe.

verses.arabicText: خَتَمَ اللَّهُ عَلَىٰ قُلُوبِهِمْ وَعَلَىٰ سَمْعِهِمْ ۖ وَعَلَىٰٓ أَبْصَـٰرِهِمْ غِشَـٰوَةٌ وَلَهُمْ عَذَابٌ عَظِيمٌ
verses.translation: Allah has set a seal on their hearts and on their hearing, and on their eyes is a veil; great is the penalty they incur.

verses.arabicText: وَمِنَ ٱلنَّاسِ مَن يَقُولُ آمَنَّا بِٱللَّهِ وَبِٱلْيَوْمِ ٱلْـَٔاخِرِ وَمَا هُم بِمُؤْمِنِينَ
verses.translation: Of the people there are some who say: 'We believe in Allah and the Last Day'; but they do not believe.

verses.arabicText: يُخَادِعُونَ ٱللَّهَ وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَمَا يَخْدَعُونَ إِلَّآ أَنفُسَهُمْ وَمَا يَشْعُرُونَ
verses.translation: Fain would they deceive Allah and those who believe, but they only deceive themselves, and realise it not!

verses.arabicText: فِى قُلُوبِهِم مَّرَضٌۭ فَزَادَهُمُ ٱللَّهُ مَرَضًۭا ۖ وَلَهُمْ عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٌۢ بِمَا كَانُوا۟ يَكْذِبُونَ
verses.translation: In their hearts is a disease; and Allah has increased their disease: and grievous is the penalty they incur, because they are false.

verses.arabicText: وَإِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمْ لَا تُفْسِدُوا۟ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ قَالُوٓا۟ إِنَّمَا نَحْنُ مُصْلِحُونَ
verses.translation: When it is said to them: 'Make not mischief on the earth,' they say: 'Why, we only want to make peace!'

verses.arabicText: أَلَآ إِنَّهُمْ هُمُ ٱلْمُفْسِدُونَ وَلَـٰكِن لَّا يَشْعُرُونَ
verses.translation: Of a surety, they are the ones who make mischief, but they realise it not.

verses.arabicText: وَإِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمْ ءَامِنُوا۟ كَمَآ ءَامَنَ ٱلنَّاسُ قَالُوٓا۟ أَنُؤْمِنُ كَمَآ ءَامَنَ ٱلسُّفَهَآءُ ۗ أَلَآ إِنَّهُمْ هُمُ ٱلسُّفَهَآءُ وَلَـٰكِن لَّا يَعْلَمُونَ
verses.translation: When it is said to them: 'Believe as the others believe,' they say: 'Shall we believe as the fools believe?' Nay, of a surety they are the fools, but they do not know.

verses.arabicText: وَإِذَا لَقُوا۟ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ قَالُوٓا۟ ءَامَنَّا ۖ وَإِذَا خَلَوْا۟ إِلَىٰ شَيَـٰطِينِهِمْ قَالُوٓا۟ إِنَّا مَعَكُمْ ۖ إِنَّمَا نَحْنُ مُسْتَهْزِءُونَ
verses.translation: When they meet those who believe, they say: 'We believe.' But when they are alone with their evil ones, they say: 'We are really with you; we were only jesting.'

verses.arabicText: ٱللَّهُ يَسْتَهْزِئُ بِهِمْ وَيَمُدُّهُمْ فِى طُغْيَـٰنِهِمْ يَعْمَهُونَ
verses.translation: Allah will throw back their mockery on them, and give them rope in their trespasses; so they will wander like blind ones.

verses.arabicText: أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱشْتَرَوُا۟ ٱلضَّلَـٰلَةَ بِٱلْهُدَىٰ ۖ فَمَا رَبِحَت تِّجَـٰرَتُهُمْ وَمَا كَانُوا۟ مُهْتَدِينَ
verses.translation: These are they who have bartered Guidance for error: but their traffic is profitless, and they have lost true direction.

verses.arabicText: مَثَلُهُمْ كَمَثَلِ ٱلَّذِى ٱسْتَوْقَدَ نَارًۭا فَلَمَّآ أَضَآءَتْ مَا حَوْلَهُۥ ذَهَبَ ٱللَّهُ بِنُورِهِمْ وَتَرَكَهُمْ فِى ظُلُمَـٰتٍۢ لَّا يُبْصِرُونَ
verses.translation: Their similitude is that of a man who kindled a fire; when it lighted all around him, Allah took away their light, and left them in utter darkness, so they could not see.

verses.arabicText: صُمٌّۭ بُكْمٌ عُمْىٌۭ فَهُمْ لَا يَرْجِعُونَ
verses.translation: Deaf, dumb, and blind, they will not return to the right path.

verses.arabicText: أَوْ كَصَيِّبٍۢ مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ فِيهِ ظُلُمَـٰتٌۭ وَرَعْدٌۭ وَبَرْقٌۭ يَجْعَلُونَ أَصَـٰبِعَهُمْ فِىٓ ءَاذَانِهِم مِّنَ ٱلصَّوَٰعِقِ حَذَرَ ٱلْمَوْتِ ۚ وَٱللَّهُ مُحِيطٌۢ بِٱلْكَـٰفِرِينَ
verses.translation: Or (another similitude) is that of a rain-laden cloud from the sky: in it are zones of darkness, thunder, and lightning...

verses.arabicText: يَكَادُ ٱلْبَرْقُ يَخْطَفُ أَبْصَـٰرَهُمْ ۖ كُلَّمَآ أَضَآءَ لَهُم مَّشَوْا۟ فِيهِ وَإِذَآ أَظْلَمَ عَلَيْهِمْ قَامُوا۟ ۚ وَلَوْ شَآءَ ٱللَّهُ لَذَهَبَ بِسَمْعِهِمْ وَأَبْصَـٰرِهِمْ ۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَىْءٍۢ قَدِيرٌۭ
verses.translation: The lightning all but snatches away their sight; whenever it flashes, they walk therein, and when the darkness grows on them, they stand still...

verses.arabicText: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّاسُ ٱعْبُدُوا۟ رَبَّكُمُ ٱلَّذِى خَلَقَكُمْ وَٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبْلِكُمْ لَعَلَّكُمْ تَتَّقُونَ
verses.translation: O ye people! Worship your Guardian-Lord, who created you and those who came before you, that ye may become righteous.

verses.arabicText: ٱلَّذِى جَعَلَ لَكُمُ ٱلْأَرْضَ فِرَاشًۭا وَٱلسَّمَآءَ بِنَآءًۭ وَأَنزَلَ مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ مَآءًۭ فَأَخْرَجَ بِهِۦ مِنَ ٱلثَّمَرَٰتِ رِزْقًۭا لَّكُمْ ۖ فَلَا تَجْعَلُوا۟ لِلَّهِ أَندَادًۭا وَأَنتُمْ تَعْلَمُونَ
verses.translation: Who made the earth your couch, and the heavens your canopy; and sent down rain from the heavens; and brought forth fruits for your sustenance; then set not up rivals unto Allah when ye know.

verses.arabicText: وَإِن كُنتُمْ فِى رَيْبٍۢ مِّمَّا نَزَّلْنَا عَلَىٰ عَبْدِنَا فَأْتُوا۟ بِسُورَةٍۢ مِّن مِّثْلِهِۦ ۖ وَٱدْعُوا۟ شُهَدَآءَكُم مِّن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ إِن كُنتُمْ صَـٰدِقِينَ
verses.translation: And if ye are in doubt as to what We have revealed from time to time to Our servant, then produce a Sura like thereunto; and call your witnesses besides Allah, if your doubts are true.

verses.arabicText: فَإِن لَّمْ تَفْعَلُوا۟ وَلَن تَفْعَلُوا۟ فَٱتَّقُوا۟ ٱلنَّارَ ٱلَّتِى وَقُودُهَا ٱلنَّاسُ وَٱلْحِجَارَةُ ۖ أُعِدَّتْ لِلْكَـٰفِرِينَ
verses.translation: But if ye cannot—and of a surety ye cannot—then fear the Fire whose fuel is men and stones, prepared for those who reject Faith.

verses.arabicText: وَبَشِّرِ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ أَنَّ لَهُمْ جَنَّـٰتٍۢ تَجْرِى مِن تَحْتِهَا ٱلْأَنْهَـٰرُ ۖ كُلَّمَا رُزِقُوا۟ مِنْهَا مِن ثَمَرَةٍۢ رِّزْقًۭا قَالُوا۟ هَـٰذَا ٱلَّذِى رُزِقْنَا مِن قَبْلُ ۖ وَأُتُوا۟ بِهِۦ مُتَشَـٰبِهًۭا ۖ وَلَهُمْ فِيهَآ أَزْوَٰجٌۭ مُّطَهَّرَةٌۭ وَهُمْ فِيهَا خَـٰلِدُونَ
verses.translation: Give glad tidings to those who believe and work righteousness, that their portion is Gardens beneath which rivers flow...

verses.arabicText: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يَسْتَحْىِۦٓ أَن يَضْرِبَ مَثَلًۭا مَّا بَعُوضَةًۭ فَمَا فَوْقَهَا ۚ فَأَمَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ فَيَعْلَمُونَ أَنَّهُ ٱلْحَقُّ مِن رَّبِّهِمْ ۖ وَأَمَّا ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ فَيَقُولُونَ مَاذَآ أَرَادَ ٱللَّهُ بِهَـٰذَا مَثَلًۭا ۘ
verses.translation: Allah disdains not to use the similitude of things, lowest as well as highest...

verses.arabicText: ٱلَّذِينَ يَنقُضُونَ عَهْدَ ٱللَّهِ مِنۢ بَعْدِ مِيثَـٰقِهِۦ وَيَقْطَعُونَ مَآ أَمَرَ ٱللَّهُ بِهِۦٓ أَن يُوصَلَ وَيُفْسِدُونَ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ ۚ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلْخَـٰسِرُونَ
verses.translation: Those who break Allah’s Covenant after it is ratified, and sunder what Allah has ordered to be joined, and do mischief on earth; these cause loss to themselves.

verses.arabicText: كَيْفَ تَكْفُرُونَ بِٱللَّهِ وَكُنتُمْ أَمْوَٰتًۭا فَأَحْيَـٰكُمْ ۖ ثُمَّ يُمِيتُكُمْ ثُمَّ يُحْيِيكُمْ ثُمَّ إِلَيْهِ تُرْجَعُونَ
verses.translation: How can ye reject the faith in Allah? Seeing that ye were without life, and He gave you life...

verses.arabicText: هُوَ ٱلَّذِى خَلَقَ لَكُم مَّا فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ جَمِيعًۭا ثُمَّ ٱسْتَوَىٰٓ إِلَى ٱلسَّمَآءِ فَسَوَّىٰهُنَّ سَبْعَ سَمَـٰوَٰتٍۢ ۚ وَهُوَ بِكُلِّ شَىْءٍ عَلِيمٌۭ
verses.translation: It is He Who hath created for you all things that are on earth; then He turned to the heavens and made them seven firmaments...

verses.arabicText: وَإِذْ قَالَ رَبُّكَ لِلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةِ إِنِّى جَاعِلٌۭ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ خَلِيفَةًۭ ۖ قَالُوٓا۟ أَتَجْعَلُ فِيهَا مَن يُفْسِدُ فِيهَا...
verses.translation: Behold, thy Lord said to the angels: 'I will create a vicegerent on earth.' They said: 'Wilt Thou place therein one who will make mischief...'

verses.arabicText: وَعَلَّمَ ءَادَمَ ٱلْأَسْمَآءَ كُلَّهَا...
verses.translation: And He taught Adam the names of all things; then He placed them before the angels...

verses.arabicText: قَالُوا۟ سُبْحَـٰنَكَ لَا عِلْمَ لَنَآ إِلَّا مَا عَلَّمْتَنَآ ۖ إِنَّكَ أَنتَ ٱلْعَلِيمُ ٱلْحَكِيمُ
verses.translation: They said: 'Glory to Thee; of knowledge we have none, save what Thou hast taught us...'

verses.arabicText: قَالَ يَـٰٓـَٔادَمُ أَنۢبِئْهُم بِأَسْمَآئِهِمْ...
verses.translation: He said: 'O Adam! Tell them their names.' When he had told them...

verses.arabicText: وَإِذْ قُلْنَا لِلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةِ ٱسْجُدُوا۟ لِـَٔادَمَ...
verses.translation: And behold, We said to the angels: 'Bow down to Adam'; they bowed down except Iblis...

verses.arabicText: وَقُلْنَا يَـٰٓـَٔادَمُ ٱسْكُنْ أَنتَ وَزَوْجُكَ ٱلْجَنَّةَ...
verses.translation: We said: 'O Adam! Dwell thou and thy wife in the Garden, and eat freely of the bountiful things therein...'

verses.arabicText: فَأَزَلَّهُمَا ٱلشَّيْطَـٰنُ عَنْهَا...
verses.translation: But Satan caused them to slip, and got them out of the happy state in which they were...

verses.arabicText: فَتَلَقَّىٰٓ ءَادَمُ مِن رَّبِّهِۦ كَلِمَـٰتٍۢ...
verses.translation: Then learnt Adam from his Lord words of inspiration; and his Lord turned towards him...

verses.arabicText: قُلْنَا ٱهْبِطُوا۟ مِنْهَا جَمِيعًۭا...
verses.translation: We said: 'Get ye down all from here; and if, as is sure, there comes to you Guidance from Me...'

verses.arabicText: وَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ وَكَذَّبُوا۟ بِـَٔايَـٰتِنَآ...
verses.translation: But those who reject Faith and believe in Our Signs, they shall be companions of the Fire...

verses.arabicText: يَـٰبَنِىٓ إِسْرَٰٓءِيلَ ٱذْكُرُوا۟ نِعْمَتِىَ ٱلَّتِىٓ أَنْعَمْتُ عَلَيْكُمْ...
verses.translation: O Children of Israel! Remember My favour which I bestowed upon you, and fulfil your Covenant with Me...
